title: Exhortation and admonition of the Friends and Brethren of London chiefly, to all maid-servants (who make profession of the pure ever-lasting gospel of peace and salvation) as are, or may be servants in the families of Friends or others, in and about this city.
notes: Signed: ... London, the Eleaventh of the Ninth Moneth, 1672.
Reproduction of original in: Friends' Library (London, England).
